juding_criteria:
Here is a bullet list of required elements:

*   Original sectional sofa
*   Original rectangular grey pillow on sofa
*   Original round, reflective coffee table
*   Original circular patterned rug
*   Original large window with view of trees
*   Modern chandelier with all globes unlit
*   Recessed ceiling lights in the living room area appearing unlit
*   Strip lighting along the ceiling/wall junction in the living room area appearing unlit
*   Original large wall clock
*   Original dining area elements (table, chairs)
*   Original kitchen area elements (cabinets, island, range hood)
*   Original staircase
*   Living room area appearing significantly darker than in the original image
*   Natural light from the window as a prominent illumination source for the living room area
